pos_mean_info_list.mean: 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 正式用词，强调经过周密观察或研究而有所获得和发现，尤指发现有意隐藏之物。
普通用词，指发现本来存在，但示被认识的事物、真理或情况。
较正式用词，指有意搜寻与发现。
普通用词，可指偶然发现，也可指经过寻找后得到或重新获得已失去的东西。强调动作的结果。

bilingual.target: 发现你身边的野生动物！
你可能会发现一个神秘的岛屿。

bilingual.source: Discover the importance of learning different subjects.
bilingual.target: 发现学习不同科目的重要性。

bilingual.source: Students can do their schoolwork and discover new information.
bilingual.target: 学生可以做作业并发现新信息。

bilingual.source: A gentleman takes as much trouble to discover what is right.
bilingual.target: 君子尽力发现什么是正确的。

bilingual.source: There is so much more for visitors to discover about Maori culture.
bilingual.target: 游客还有更多关于毛利文化的发现。

bilingual.source: It was really interesting to discover something about my father's life as a child.
bilingual.target: 发现一些关于我父亲童年生活的事情真的很有趣。

bilingual.source: Worked as the leader of a research team aiming to discover a treatment for malaria.
bilingual.target: 担任研究团队的负责人，旨在发现治疗疟疾的方法。

bilingual.source: It is said that a Chinese ruler called Shen Nong was the first to discover tea as a drink.
bilingual.target: 据说一位名叫神农的中国统治者是第一个发现茶可以作为饮料的人。

bilingual.source: They set sail but then they discover that Long John Silver, the cook, and the other men on the ship are all pirates.
bilingual.target: 他们起航了，但随后发现厨师长约翰·西尔弗和船上的其他人都是海盗。

list.abstract: discover（英 [dɪˈskʌvə]，美 [dɪˈskʌvər]），英语单词，动词，意思为发现；泄漏；知晓。短语搭配有discover truth（发现真理）。例句为“They discover the cells connected to humans.（他们发现了与人类相关的细胞。）” discover及物动词类近义词有detect、sniff out等。第三人称单数为discovers。现在分词为 discovering。过去式为discovered。过去分词为discovered。

及物动词vt.
1.
发现
Shediscoveredthat the man was a quack.
她发现那人是个庸医。
Who firstdiscoveredAmerica?
谁最早发现美洲大陆?
2.
发觉;找到
The lost bike wasdiscoveredat the bus stop.
丢了的自行车在公共汽车站那儿找到了。
discover
1.
发现，泄露，看出
新概念英语词汇手册第二册(1)_英语词汇...
discovervt.发现，泄露，看出
http://english.studyw...
2.
发现；暴露，显示
我的单词：越背越过瘾__涛如雪
discovervt.发现；暴露，显示
http://xzj.2000y.net/...
3.
做出重大发现
[英语学习]经典教程《新概念英语》第三册...
discover做出重大发现

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, guys. Whatcha doin'? Going out to discover electricity?
yingyinNormal.zh: 各位好，在忙什么？出去发现电的存在吗？

yingyinNormal.en: As you will no doubt soon discover, not everyone agrees with our methods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快你就会发现，不是所有人都同意我们的方案。

yingyinNormal.en: He is known in the wild as Strider. His true name, you must discover for yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他被称作"大步佬"，他的真名，你必须自己发现。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: What's your suggestion? We show her the photos and let her discover her weird smile on her own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有什么建议？我们给她看照片，让她自己发现她诡异的笑容。

yingyinNormal.en: Not yet, sir. I don't have it all yet. I need to dig deeper. More to discover? A lot more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，老师。我还不知道全部。我要再深挖一些。还能有更多发现吗？还有很多。

yingyinNormal.en: Wouldn't that be nice. It could also help me identify my enemies, discover their fears and then...
yingyinNormal.zh: 那何尝不是件好事。还可以帮助我找出我的敌人，发现他们的恐惧，然后……

yingyinNormal.en: Because I told you to! Like, if a monkey took the picture, did it discover the comet? Excuse me?!
yingyinNormal.zh: 是因为我让你拍下来！如果照片是一只猴子拍的，难道彗星是它发现的吗？你说啥？！

yingyinNormal.en: And us. If Samaritan and its human agents discover you, it could lead them to every single one of us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加上我们，要是撒马利亚人和它的手下发现了你，它会直接追踪到我们每一个人。

yingyinNormal.en: When I did this, I was usually able to discover principles that would prevent me from repeating the same mistakes in the future. And I could see that being successful simply consisted of five steps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我这么做的时候，我通常能够发现能在未来防止我重复同样错误的原则。我发现成功只有五个步骤。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I always figured it was to study us, discover our weaknesses, and report back to your alien overlords.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关于这点，我一直认为你是来发现我们地球人的弱点再报告给你们的外星君主。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't tell you how grateful I am to Sam the janitor to this day. He really is one of the people who helped me discover my life's purpose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法形容，直到今天，我还要多感谢保卫人员山姆，他真的是帮助我发现人生目标的一个人。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes those influences can help them to discover their own unique voice. And sometimes those influences, turn you into a copycat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时候那些影响力会帮助他们发现自己的特质，但有时候那些影响力会让你变成一个没有主见的模仿者。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're referring to the work of Benjamin Franklin, he did not discover electricity, he merely used a kite to determine that lightning consists of electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你说的是本杰明·富兰克林的成果，他没有“发现电的存在”，他只是利用风筝证明闪电“带”电。

yingyinNormal.en: The trouble isn't with me, Penny, it's with your gender. Someday, scientists will discover that second X chromosome contains nothing but nonsense and twaddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题不在我这，佩妮，而在你们女人身上，总有一天，科学家们会发现女性的第二条X染色体除了胡说和废话之外，其他一无所有。

yingyinNormal.en: We have yet to discover a dark matter particle, but scientists all over the world are searching for this elusive particle or particles and the effects of dark matter on the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目前我们还没能发现一块暗物质颗粒，但全世界的科学家们都在探索这个或这些神秘的物质以及它对宇宙所产生的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, dear Lord. A man pops out for a moment to evacuate his bowels and catch up on the adventures of the Caped Crusader, only to emerge and discover his apartment has been transformed into a cabaret.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，真要命，人家只是走开了一下，清了清肠子，顺便追一下斗篷战士[蝙蝠侠别称]的冒险之旅，再出来就发现家里赫然变成卡巴莱酒馆了。

yingyinNormal.en: And I would soon discover that by playing music or singing, other kids would for a brief moment forget about my race or color and accept me and then be able to see me for who I truly am, a human being who's emotional, spiritual, curious about the world and has a need for love, just like everyone else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很快发现演奏音乐，或者唱歌时，其他孩子会暂时忘记我的种族，我的肤色，接受我，能够看到真正的我，一个人，有感情，有灵魂，对世界好奇，需要爱，就和他们每个人一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. Did she discover a cure for something?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，她是研发出某种疾病的解药之类的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And in the end, you may discover the answer to your question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最终，或许你能找到想要的答案。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not sure, but I think I'm about to discover how the banana felt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道，不过我可能就要知道那香蕉什么感觉了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 发现；被发现；强制性透露；（Discovery）红脆苹果

word_family.mean: v. 发现；泄漏；知晓；首次察觉…的吸引力；透露…的身份；显露

examination_example.sentence: For instance, failure can help you <highlight>discover</highlight> how strong a person you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，失败可以帮助你发现你是一个多么坚强的人。

examination_example.sentence: Failing at something can help you <highlight>discover</highlight> your truest friends, or help you find unexpected motivation to succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某件事上失败可以帮助你发现你最真诚的朋友，或者帮助你找到意想不到的成功动力。

examination_example.sentence: Most archaeological sites have been located by means of careful searching, while many others have been <highlight>discovered</highlight> by accident.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数考古遗址都是通过仔细搜索找到的，而其他许多遗址是偶然发现的。

sense_info_list.en: perceive the attractions of an activity/subject for the first time

examination_example.sentence: I first <highlight>discovered</highlight> the Napoleonic cryptographic battle a few years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我第一次发现拿破仑密码战是在几年前。

word_usage.usage: discover作及物动词，其后可接名词、代词、that/wh-引导的从句以及“to be+ n./adj.”等形式，如：We never did discover why she gave up her job.，；也可用于被动结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 发现；被发现；强制性透露；（Discovery）红脆苹果

word_family.mean: v. 发现；泄漏；知晓；首次察觉…的吸引力；透露…的身份；显露

examination_example.sentence: For instance, DeWalt <highlight>discovered</highlight> that many contractors were holding on to their old tools, even if they no longer worked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，DeWalt发现许多承包商仍然保留着他们的旧工具，即使它们已不再工作。

examination_example.sentence: If the livestock falls ill or requires assistance, it can be a long time for farmers to <highlight>discover</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果牲畜生病或需要帮助，农民可能需要很长时间才能发现。

examination_example.sentence: To match the growing demand, services are springing up to make it easier to enable other researchers to <highlight>discover</highlight> and cite them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了满足不断增长的需求，服务应运而生让其他研究人员能够发现和引用它们。

sense_info_list.en: perceive the attractions of an activity/subject for the first time

word_usage.usage:
discover 指发现本来存在但一直未被认识的东西。也可以表示“撞见”“碰见”。
示例：I discover by chance that they are stealing my apple.
我撞见他们在偷我的苹果。

discover sb doing sth.表示“碰见某人正在做某事”；discover sb +动词不定式，表示“发现某人...”。
示例：
(1) I discovered her sitting near the fire， reading a book. 
我发现她正坐在炉火边看书。
(2) We discovered her to be a good cook. 
我们发现她很会做饭。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 较正式用词, 指有意搜寻与发现。
正式用词, 强调经过周密观察或研究而有所获得和发现, 尤指发现有意隐藏之物。
普通用词, 指发现本来存在, 但示被认识的事物、真理或情况。
普通用词, 可指偶然发现, 也可指经过寻找后得到或重新获得已失去的东西。强调动作的结果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 发现；被发现；强制性透露；（Discovery）红脆苹果

word_family.mean: v. 发现；泄漏；知晓；首次察觉…的吸引力；透露…的身份；显露

examination_example.sentence: The goal was simple, to <highlight>discover</highlight> how the species adapted to the kind of heat that can literally melt the bottom of shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目的很简单，就是要发现这个物种是如何适应那种可以融化鞋底的热度的。

examination_example.sentence: One team of psychologists <highlight>discovered</highlight> that they would rather self-administer electric shocks than sit alone with their thoughts for 15 minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组心理学家发现，他们宁愿自我电击，也不愿独自坐着思考15分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Salthouse said, "We gain insight in cognition changes, and may possibly <highlight>discover</highlight> ways to slow the rate of decline. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 萨尔特豪斯说：“我们对认知的变化有了深入的了解，可能还会发现减缓衰退速度的方法。”

sense_info_list.en: perceive the attractions of an activity/subject for the first time

examination_example.sentence: This type of play—especially with building blocks—helps children <highlight>discover</highlight> and develop key principles in math and geometry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种类型的游戏——尤其是积木——帮助孩子接触和发展数学和几何的关键原理。

examination_example.sentence: And kids really learn better when they're actively engaged and have to really <highlight>discover</highlight> things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当孩子们积极投入并不得不真正发现事物时，他们会学得更好。

我撞见他们在偷我的苹果。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 较正式用词，指有意搜寻与发现。
正式用词，强调经过周密观察或研究而有所获得和发现，尤指发现有意隐藏之物。
普通用词，指发现本来存在，但示被认识的事物、真理或情况。
普通用词，可指偶然发现，也可指经过寻找后得到或重新获得已失去的东西。强调动作的结果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 发现；被发现；强制性透露；（Discovery）红脆苹果
adj. 未被发现的；隐藏的

word_family.mean: v. 发现；泄漏；知晓；首次察觉…的吸引力；透露…的身份；显露

examination_example.sentence: One afternoon, while attempting to get into bed she collapsed (倒下) from what was eventually <highlight>discovered</highlight> to be a heart attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天下午，当她试图上床睡觉时，她因终于查明的心脏病发作而倒下。

examination_example.sentence: It was not until I followed this feeling to its source that I <highlight>discovered</highlight> I had a passion for writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到我跟随这种感觉找到了它的源头，我才发现我对写作有了热情。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>discovered</highlight> that he could earn some money while doing something he really enjoyed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现他可以一边赚钱，一边做他真正喜欢的事情。

sense_info_list.en: perceive the attractions of an activity/subject for the first time

examination_example.sentence: Mari starts changing her life and <highlight>discovers</highlight> a world of diverse "night people" who are hiding secrets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玛丽开始改变自己的生活，发现了一个多样的“夜猫子”的世界，那里的人们都隐藏着秘密。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We have <highlight>discovered</highlight> unknown lives in the universe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们发现了宇宙中未知的生命。

examination_example.sentence: When the mother returned to her seat, she <highlight>discovered</highlight> that the child was missing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当母亲回到座位上时，她发现孩子不见了。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>discovered</highlight> that listening to something interesting is the secret to language learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现听一些有趣的东西是语言学习的秘诀。

word_usage.usage:
discover 指发现本来存在但一直未被认识的东西。也可以表示“撞见”“碰见”。
示例：I discover by chance that they are stealing my apple.
我撞见他们在偷我的苹果。

discover sb. doing sth.表示“碰见某人正在做某事”；discover sb +动词不定式，表示“发现某人...”。
示例：
(1) I discovered her sitting near the fire， reading a book. 
我发现她正坐在炉火边看书。
(2) We discovered her to be a good cook. 
我们发现她很会做饭。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指发现本来存在，但未被认识的事物、真理或情况。
普通用词，可指偶然发现，也可指经过寻找后得到或重新获得已失去的东西，强调动作的结果。
